name: Slickdeals Midnight Theme Fixes
description:
Designed to be used with the Classic view Midnight theme on Slickdeals (which is no longer officially supported).
Changes background color in various places (front page, search results, and forum) to blend in with the rest of the theme.

Feel free to contact me with any suggestions or fixes.
